attributes.action: lend his support to the SAVE BBC 6MUSIC campaign and review the BBC Trust report of March 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC justifies the licence fee by promising a commitment to inclusivity and creativity and insisting that it is the fee-payers who determine how the money is spent. We ask that the Prime Minister remind the executives of the Corporation that a 120,000 strong campaign has emerged in support of this 'minority' station and perhaps the budget cuts would be better directed towards the salaries of top-level management, Chris Moyles and Chris Evans.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
